BREAST-COMPOSITION: This mammogram image shows a heterogeneously dense breast composition (ACR C), indicating a significant amount of glandular tissue that can make it more challenging to detect abnormalities.
FINDINGS: There are no clear signs of masses, calcifications, or architectural distortion in this image. However, due to the heterogeneously dense breast composition, it is recommended for short-term follow-up (BI-RADS 3) to confirm stability.
